text: The 1936 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy during the 1936 college football season. In their third season under head coach Tom Hamilton, the Midshipmen compiled a record and outscored their opponents by a combined score of They finished the season ranked 18th in the first year of the AP Poll. ==Schedule== ==References== Navy Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Navy Midshipmen
